metadata.title: CVE-2018-12495 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
The quoteblock function in markdown.c in libmarkdown.a in DISCOUNT 2.2.3a allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-12495` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

discount - 2.2.4-1
libmarkdown2 - 2.2.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: discount package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.4-1').
